pages.text: Vault Tools are used for $(l)breaking Chests$() and $(l)Spawners$() within Vaults.$(br2)They can only be $(l)crafted$() by the player.$(br2)They can be enhanced further using $(l:vault_tools/jewels)$(l)Jewels$().

pages.title: Base Types
pages.text: The base type of a Vault Tool determines its $(l)functionality$().$(br2)$(l)Picks$(), $(l)Axes$() and $(l)Shovels$() have their default behavior.$(br2)$(l)Hammers$() mine a $(l)square$() area, but need other functionalities to collect the materials.$(br2)$(l)Sickles$() have the same functionality as $(l)Shears$() do.

pages.title: Tiers
pages.text: $(br)Vault Tools can be crafted in various tiers. Most are gated behind the player's $(l)level$().$(br2)The higher the tier, the more $(l)capacity$() and $(l)repairs$() the Vault Tool has.$(br2)The capacity determines the $(l)available space$() for Jewel modifications.

pages.title: Tiers
pages.text: $(br)The available tiers are:$(br)$(li)Chromatic Iron$(li)Chromatic Steel$(li)Black Chromatic Steel$(li)Melded$(li)Vaulterite$(li)Echoing$(li)Prismatic
